code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./LoginPageStyle.css';import{ToastContainer,toast}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';import{useAuth}from'./AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const{login}=useAuth();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const url="http://localhost:5000/user/".concat(email);const response=await fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});console.log(response);if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();if(data&&data.password===password){toast.success('Login successful!');login();navigate('/view');}else{toast.error('Invalid email or password');}}else{toast.error('Login failed');}}catch(err){console.error('Error logging in:',err);toast.error('An error occurred while trying to log in');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{})]});};export default LoginPage;
